name: Friend Hunt
description:
Friend Hunt is a very short RPG Maker 2003 game. The game deals with a bunny name Cinnamon as the find themselves trying to befriend someone. Who is out to kill them. 

Friend Hunt is a 2-3  minute game, the game was made in 5 days in RPG Maker 2003.  This is a warning to any let's player who plays this game, since it's very short.

If you run into any errors, try installing the RPG Maker 2003 RTP
